ovdesc.p: This file serves as a link between the mandate & the underlying contract id's and the contract ids can be MG contracts/Standalone DDI's / Resubmitted DDI's, which use this mandate.
All updates to this file are effected automatically by the system and the only functions users are allowed to perform are (L)IST, (S)EE and (P)RINT.

desc.p: This contains the MG contract id / Standalone DDI reference / Resubmitted DDI reference- which is using this mandate.
The id of this file is a mandate id (as defined in DD.DDI)
